songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
Eutai khok ma sangai kheleka din
Saino ko geet sangai gayeka din
Yad auchha ti mitha pal haru ek chhin
Hune chhaina kahile yo man bata bilin
Man bhitrako yo maya rah bandhan
Pariwar ko kasailai kehi huda rokine yo dhadkan
Tada huda ko tyo tadpan
Tara kahile saath nachodne jati ayeni badha rah adhkan
Euta sano pariwar sangai hurkiyau hami
Kahile chitta nabhujne yo ek arka ko bani
Timi malai chitarne, ma chai kapal tanne
Padai thikai tara dubai khelna babaal janne
Sabai kura manne time ma chahi ali fatah ho
Yaad hola aama le badera sisno pani lagako
Pani ma bhada kuti khelda ni katti maja thyo
Samjhera timilai mero aakha nai rasayo

[Chorus] x2
Arko barsha chai tihar ma pakkai aauchhu didi
Ani afnai haat le tika lagaidinu timi
Yo barsa tah tyestai vo, kamai pani pugena
Jutho pani paryo ani sait pani judena

[Verse 2]
Malai ajhai yaad chha jaba ma sanai thye
Dhunga le hanera timro tauko futaidiye
Tara sachi hai, ma timilai kati satauthey
Sabai bhanda badi tara timi sangai ramauthey
Timi pani kahile ris uthdo kahile hasauthyo
Baato katnu agadi mero haat samauthyo
Tyespachi hamro basai sarai vo
Mul ghar {Leluwa ?] tara basai terai ko
Sanai ma Kathmandu aauda banyo valley topper
Hune biruwa ko chillo paat, timi vayau doctor
Dherai khusi hunuvayo mamu and baba
Hamile ni khusiyali ma khana payau papa
Bihe pani vayo gayau timi tada
Tei pani hamro sambandha chha ragat bhanda kada
Maya chai namara hai kahile kahi samjhinu
Ani salo le bhinaju lai sodeko chha bhandinu

[Chorus] x2
Arko barsha chai tihar ma pakkai aauchhu didi
Ani afnai haat le tika lagaidinu timi
Yo barsa tah tyestai vo, kamai pani pugena
Jutho pani paryo ani sait pani judena
songs.title: Didi
